website_summaries.verdict: Available in 5 colors and made from a hard, tough polymer, the innovative design of this doorstop wedges doors in both directions, making it the hardest to dislodge of any doorstop we considered.
pros: Jamm's doorstop is designed to slide beneath the end of the door rather than the middle
This wedges the door in place in both directions
It also prevents this doorstop from obstructing walkways
Multiple color options and tough material
cons: This model's maximum 1-inch door gap is shorter than some other models

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product, but turned out disappointed. First, it's made of plastic, not rubber, so there is no grip at all. And second, the profile is too low. With just a slight bit of pressure the door rolls over the edges. I liked the look of this compared to other door stops, but unless you're buying it as a decoration it's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Teacher recommend for heavy doors -  Great  for propping from the side edge!
customer_reviews.text: Rim a teacher with a very heavy door. This stopper works where every other doorstop failed. I use it on the edge side of the door. One of my students kicked it under the side like a regular doorstop and it took a big chunk out of the doorstop, so it’s not as durable as I would like. I will purchase another when this one give out as it is the best I have found. And all of us teachers are always hunting good doorstops. The fact that you can pick your color is also great so we can tell whose is whose!
customer_reviews.author: snj

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great item!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Jamm! We like to run our AC in the bedroom on warm nights but also have two fluffy cats that like to barge in and out of the bedroom, swinging the door open too wide. Now we can keep the door closed with a cat sized opening that doesn't let all the cool air escape. I ordered the pink so it's easy to see. :) I had an incredible customer service experience with the company directly after I received an empty box from Amazon. They replaced my missing Jamm immediately.
customer_reviews.author: augustastclaire

customer_reviews.title: Nice door stop
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice-looking and well-made doorstop. I bought it because you only need one to stop the door whereas you need to use two regular ones. Other than this benefit, I don't see this type of doorstops outperform other doorsteps, as described in the product title. To me, it's certainly not decorative. It's a doorstop, it's a doorstop. It does its job. That's all. When you jam it underneath the door, to make it work, you still need to double-check if the door can't move before let go. I had it happen to me several times that the doorstop didn't actually stop the door. So, in that sense, this product is probably too pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Boyang Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Surprising!
customer_reviews.text: When I received these I was initially dissappointed because they were stiff and not soft and rubbery like I had envisioned they would be. However, after getting used to them and learning how to use these, they are one of my most loved baby-proofing devices, ever! The kids no longer swing the doors around! I can leave the front door open for sunlight and I don't worry about their fingers getting slammed by the door or pinched in the hinges! Things are so much quieter and happier around here now! Don't hesitate to buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: Rpapa

customer_reviews.title: Great Doorstop
customer_reviews.text: Office door -- will not stay open when coats are placed behind it. This rubber doorstop fits the bill-- no one trips over it and it fits squarely under the door. Door does not move until you remove the stop itself. Since I purchased other, inferior doorstops much more reasonably I felt this was an expensive solution. However, the others did not last and got pretty beat up. I have every assurance this will last for many years to come. Shows no signs of wear. I would by again! This item is wider than the door itself; i purchased in a white color, and so is quite visible.
customer_reviews.author: Rando

customer_reviews.title: A Stand Out
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different types of doorstops for a company with different types of doors, space underneath, flooring from carpet, linoleum and concrete, in multiple buildings and 800 people on site. I've bought "gigantic" ones, stackable, and ridged style. The darn things disappear constantly and also get ripped up so I replace frequently. LOVE this design. Clean, low profile but most of all holds doors firmly open with none of that slow creeping closed problem. Very, very good design.
customer_reviews.author: NinaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great door stop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom door after my old door stop went missing. Glad I did! It is great! It is rubbery and easy to use. It holds the door securely, using it the same way as a traditional door stop. I have slippery tiles and a heavy, wooden door. If I wanted to use it sideways, I probably would have had to purchase the larger sized one. Seems sturdy and I hope to use it for years! (I put my name and classroom number on it...so hopefully it won't get lost!)
customer_reviews.author: D. York

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Clearance
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this product because I don't have enough clearance between the carpet and the door for the product to work as intended. I can't slide it under the door far enough to "catch" the door in the jam pocket, so my cat pushes the door open easily. It's not the fault of the product, it's just that I don't have the clearance necessary for it to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Papa-T

customer_reviews.title: only works for certain situations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to prevent a door from being opened, for security reasons, as in a hotel room when travelling. But, it does not do that at all, the door can be easily pushed open. What I think this is designed for, is to prop a door open and it's good at that because of the curve in it's shape you can put it on the front edge of the door and it will not move in either direction. So, I do use it in my kitchen when I'm trying to get more air moving into the room. But, for making a door stay closed, not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Door Stop
customer_reviews.text: We needed something sturdy to prop open our daughter's dorm room door that has an automatic close. She uses a motorized scooter for mobility and needs to have the door propped open to drive the scooter in. This stopper has done the trick. She has an easier time kicking it into place because it's larger (compared to a "standard" size stop). I wish it was more attractive, something other than basic black. I know, that's not a real-life problem, but college-folks like fun and festive...
customer_reviews.author: Inkydinky Doodle

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased doorstops before that really didn't work. This one is unique in the way it fits under the door and stops the movement in both directions. Previously, I've found doorstops not working because of my hardwood floors. Not a problem with this one. Cross ventilation in my home can cause doors to slam unexpectedly and with a small dog, I didn't want to risk injury if she was in the wrong place at the wrong time. With this door jam, that is no longer a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Moldy in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Best doorstop ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these doorstops. We bought a regular one and a large one and both are terrific. I have also ordered a few more. Although more expensive than others, you get what you pay for. They are attractive and sturdy, and the colors are great. The only drawback for me is that our dog also likes them so I often find one or the other in her bed if I've removed it from the door temporarily and left it within her reach! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: LKB

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the cats where they want to be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter because she has 2 kittens that were always managing to lock themselves into a room. She would come home heating them loudly meowing to get out. I saw that this could be slid under the door in a parallel direction, keeping the door in a static position. Works great, problem solved! The color almost matched her door and rug, so it is barely visible.
customer_reviews.author: house4paws

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for keeping doors in place. It's small and doesn't get in my way. I have a door that swings closed very slowly and blocks my view from the bedroom through a hallway window with a beautiful view of the mountains. I tucked this under the end of the door and problem solved! I can lie in bed and see the mountains when I wake up in the morning, instead of the back of the door. :)
customer_reviews.author: Emma Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and effective. Just make sure the gap between your door and floor isn't too tall.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to measure the height of your door to make sure this will work, if it fits it's great. It's totally silent which is really nice and very fast and easy to use. It doesn't slide in perpendicular to the door like most stops but goes in at the 'skinny' end of the door so that it stops the door from opening and closing. The curve in the lower portion is perfect for us to slide it against our doorstop when not in use. Light weight, won't damage anything and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan90265

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a doorstop to keep door in place
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my patio door. Depending upon the wind, the door flies wide open and bangs my patio light on flies closed. I needed a door stop to keep it in place from both sides. I tried a couple different door stops without any luck. I like this one because you can put it under the edge of the door (not just on one side or the other). Finally, my patio door stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Very thin for a door stop!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to report this door stop does not work on any door in my home!!! Or my neighbors home on either side of me. It’s is simply very thin and doors travel right over. Almost like placing paper on the floor and expecting it to stop something!!! I purchased for hardwood floors. But I also tried on carpeted floors as well same results!!! Very disappointed! This is an item I would normally purchase at Lowe’s or Home Depot where I could hold it. But because of current situation I choose to purchase on line! Mistake!!
customer_reviews.author: BBQ4U

customer_reviews.title: Thought this was the answer, but no. Slips on tile floors.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a door stop for a heavy door to the garage that would not slip on tile floors. This is not it. It doesn't work any better than the $2 doorstop from the hardware store. Also thought this was solid rubber, but is hollow plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Carla B Hale

customer_reviews.title: Teeny-Tiny
customer_reviews.text: I measured before I ordered and these were definitely not what I was expecting. In the photo they look big and strong, but the ones I received were so tiny the doors - all of them - went right over them like they were nothing. In fact, these little things are tinier than the stoppers I am trying to replace. There’s nothing I can use them for which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for many size problems
customer_reviews.text: I love this door jam! I needed one that could be used in an area with both very low clearance and "normal" clearance. This jam is very well designed; it's very wide and has a rise that starts extremely low and goes high. It fits numerous situations. An unexpected benefit is the array of colors. I got the dusty blue and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Sits kinda low
customer_reviews.text: It's good when it fits. I do work on doors and a lot of times this door stop sits too low and the door will just swing over the whole thing. But when it works, it works.
customer_reviews.author: James Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you measure your door clearance before ordering. ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure your door clearance before ordering. Our door was too high, so now we have to order another one so that we can use this door stop.
customer_reviews.author: mehdipa

customer_reviews.title: Best door stop
customer_reviews.text: There is a difference in door stops, I have discovered. Jamm works superiorly to all the others I have used in my kindergarten class because of its high quality. It is solid so it won’t cave in after a few months of use. It’s also wider than most jams so it grips more surface and better. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia V

customer_reviews.title: A door stopper that stops a door from moving.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for a HEAVY classroom door on a slick tile floor. I wasn't sure it would work as other door stoppers have failed up to this point. Placed it in the correct fashion under the door as shown by the packaging, and voila.... the door stays open. It isn't even threatening to move. Good door. Great door stopper.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for my bathroom door
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 50s house and my bathroom door wouldn't stay open far enough. I had a cast-iron door stopper but it was too big and bulky and I worried it was damaging my tile floor. This new door stopper works perfectly. I can easily move it into place with my foot and just pull my door closed when I need to. So I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, wish we'd bought it years ago
customer_reviews.text: Door opens to a screen porch, and swing freely back and forth. On nice days we like the door wide open, stop wors great for that. But sometimes we want it just open enough for the cat to get through, and this used to require a stop on both sides of the door. This door stop fixes that problem! I wish we'd bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Smiddie-Brush

customer_reviews.title: Best stoppers for my folding cart!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I live in a small apartment and I have a folding cart on wheels. I use this cart every day and keep it in my hall bu the door. These are perfect to put under the wheels to keep it standing upright. What I love the most is they are wide and the wheels fit perfectly on them. Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine K. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Not great on wood floors
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these would be great on carpet, but on wood floors they're worthless unless you kick them under the door really hard (like hard enough to break a toe unless you're wearing shoes). I thought they were going to be more rubbery so they actually flex and cling to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chrisman

customer_reviews.title: slides along the floor
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard plastic wedge that does not grip my wood floor and instead slides along. To keep it from sliding along the floor it must be wedged so tightly that it damages the bottom of my door. I cannot recommend this, though the concept is a good one, execution is poor.
customer_reviews.author: JulesStarfish

customer_reviews.title: It works -- stops the door from moving open or closed.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this did the trick. I had to keep my dogs from getting into one of the rooms in the barn where the food was stored but allow the cat to go in! This did the trick. It should work on any door, but if the gap from floor to door bottom is over an inch and a half or more, go for the jumbo size.
customer_reviews.author: Unabashed (but honest) Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The door stays EXACTLY where you want it with this stopper
customer_reviews.text: I like this door stopper. It's got an original design. I didn't even realize that I needed a door stopper that pushed in from the end not the sides of the door, but it works great, especially in those places where you need the door to stay EXACTLY where you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Good design and color options
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use. It is not raccoon proof, however. We have a clever raccoon that has figured out how to move it just enough so that he can get his paws/claws between the 2 pocket doors to open them up to get to the cat food dishes. I jam it in as well as the other door stop for the other pocket door. Trying to not have to use an alarmed door stop, but I will if I have to.
customer_reviews.author: Maestrak

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The work ..... perhaps not enough to prevent a child from closing a door .... 75 year senior. But way overpriced for the hard rubber. I do not need anymore at my home. Do not believe this item would be recommended or purchased again. Thomas Edwin Koepke DVM Mendota Heights, Minnesota
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Edwin Koepke DVM

customer_reviews.title: I wish they can make a door jammer that works against floor carpet in a hotel room
customer_reviews.text: Hello, the door Jammers I ordered was useless against the floor carpet in my hotel room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom door won't stay open, but when I use a traditional doorstop, the suction from another door sometimes pulls it away from the doorstop. Not a problem with this doorstop. The door stays exactly where I want it, and the stop is easy to move if necessary. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: K. McMaster

customer_reviews.title: May work for some doors
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this does not work for the purpose for which I purchased it. It was for the door to the garage so I could keep the door open as I carried groceries in. However, the wedge is too low for the door and the door simply closes anyway. I will return it..
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: You'd think it was just a door stopper.. but this one is so great you actually notice!
customer_reviews.text: Super simple, but get's the work done! I need mine for a heavy metal classroom door that opens and closes many times a day, with students pulling and pushing. This door stopper is easily the best one I've ever experienced (good enough to take the time to write a review for a door stopper!!) It's undoubtedly the best one on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Augensen

customer_reviews.title: Better than most out there
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been searching for a door stop that our 10-month-old twins can’t pull out, knock over or put in their mouths. We also have a French Bulldog who has eaten door stops, so we have to make sure it’s secure. We ordered the two pack here, and one door stop is working beautifully in our bedroom. Unfortunately, the one in the babies’ room isn’t and is instantly dislodged. I think the issue is because there isn’t a lot of space between the door and the door stop. Overall, if both worked for us, I would give the company 5 stars for a sleek, effective door stop.
customer_reviews.author: The Sunny Badger

customer_reviews.title: Door Stop perfection.
customer_reviews.text: Best doorstop ever. Will hold the door in any position and it won't move. Conventional doorstops only prevent movement in one direction. Jamm holds it securely in any position. Well made and tapered to fit under any door clearance. Get one now.
customer_reviews.author: Anton C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited door space.
customer_reviews.text: Using a door stopper in the front or back is a problem for me, plus my door has about 1/4 in of space beneath the door. This is perfect for me as it fits in front of the door and is thin enough to fit snuggly with only about a 1/4" of space to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Really short
customer_reviews.text: From what I can tell, this is a great door stop. I can't be sure, though, as it's really short and doesn't actually work for our door. It's about half the height of a normal doorstop, so it slides right under our garage door without ever touching it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: but that like selling a car that's called "best car ever" brand ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay-quality, but beware of the name trick - it's called "top-rated jamm", but that like selling a car that's called "best car ever" brand car. It's just a name. I have to use the pair to keep the door open - one is not enough, as the slightest wind gust makes it slip
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty wedges. Can take quite a lot of weight!
customer_reviews.text: These wedges are heavy duty. I am using them to wedge a 200lb punching bag plus steel stand. The punching bag frame sits on a slopes floor and I needed something to wedge that would give out. I used two of these and they work fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Debounce

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Crap product. Won’t work in hard floors. May not work on carpets. Too low to catch the bottom of my door. Useless I am returning it
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. While it does work
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. While it does work, it has to be jammed so tightly under the edge of my door (with an automatic closer), that I have a very hard time removing it and stopped using it for fear that it will destroy the weatherstripping on the underside of the door. If you are using it on carpet, or your floors are not very slick, it probably would work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for heavy school door
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my heavy classroom door! Nobody can steal it because the color is bright and different than everyone else’s!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Measure your door first!
customer_reviews.text: MEASURE YOUR DOOR! I really thought this size was going to be enough for my door, but it's not. On a $10 product I'm not going to spend the money to ship it back. Maybe I can add a layer of craft foam on the bottom to raise it up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley B

customer_reviews.title: One-Stop Place For A Doorstop - Look No More!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the doorstop. It arrived quickly, and is of good quality that I think will hold up well. I also appreciated that the door stops were offered in a variety of colors to fit the room. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: After remembering it's there so I don't stub my toe, works perfect! Allows me to keep the door open slightly for cats to go in and out at night, without them or the HVAC blowing it open and closed.
customer_reviews.author: Gennifer Mallard

customer_reviews.title: Great and love the material
customer_reviews.text: Great for normal door gaps. Kept it since it is such a nice product but my current place has crazy high door gaps. This is much more average like you would find in any standard house or apartment.
customer_reviews.author: WhatsInAName?

customer_reviews.title: They're JUST ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok. I should have paid attention to another review that said the door stop was not thick enough. It really isn't. I bought these because I felt they weren't as ugly as the ones I had, but they aren't effective, as they're only 1 1/8 thick at the highest areas. They just barely work.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: A whole new way of stopping
customer_reviews.text: The big innovation is that this goes under the door parallel to the door rather than perpendicular. For me, this means less chance of tripping over the thing. It's lightweight and solid enough. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought several door stops at Targetlike stores. None of them worked because the door was too heavy. This works great so far. The only thing is it is a little hard to remove when I need to close the door. Not a big deal, if it was easy then it probably wouldn’t hold the door open.
customer_reviews.author: Seeclearly

customer_reviews.title: That lil curverature in the middle makes all the difference
customer_reviews.text: I like the slight curve of the door stopper. That makes all the difference in holding the door open. It's well made and not your typical door stop. This actually works. It stays in place. I'm very happy with this door stop. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S.

customer_reviews.title: Get one to enhance your safety
customer_reviews.text: I got these to keep in my purse for safety. In a dangerous situation you can keep an intruder from coming in a door with a doorstop. Slim and not bulky, easy to slip into my purse. Also handy for normal doorstop use!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that it holds the door in either direction. I used to have to put my old fashioned door stop on opposite sides of the door depending on what my need was. Now it's all in one. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Jarrard

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a stopper that works.
customer_reviews.text: The junk I bought at Walmart wouldn't hold the doors in position. I was always worried the wind would slam the doors shut scaring everyone in the house. These work! And they are NOT MADE IN CHINA!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wylie

customer_reviews.title: They are pink and chunky !
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they look, I wanted to leave some door open, to get the sun in. I do have doorstop behind the door, but they never stayed open. The idea that these doorstop are going at the end of the door makes them really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stops—maybe not for finished floors
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of these, they looked like the perfect size and color. Will hold door well. But we were looking for a more rubber like material—we don’t feel comfortable using on hardwood or tile..it seems like it would scratch the floor. But we are using them on a carpeted floor and out on our deck.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this door stop!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The only door stopper that has survived my students longer than a week! Easy to spot when it gets kicked down the hallway. Holds my heavy classroom door in place easily.
customer_reviews.author: Darian Corona

customer_reviews.title: Cut very low!
customer_reviews.text: Door stopper seems sturdy, but it is cut very low. It wasn't high enough and didn't work on three of my doors hanging above hardwood floors. The door that it finally works on is hanging above carpet, which narrows the gap between floor and door. I feel the price is too high for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Mama

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty neat how something so small and simple can be so handy. I use this all the time and appreciate that it is light and I can move it around with my feet/toes to wedge under the door. Yes, I would recommend this door stopper.
customer_reviews.author: SLA

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and brilliant idea
customer_reviews.text: I was little hesitant to buy it at the outset.The inner garage door is heavy and closes by itself. I tried different door stoppers and none of them worked although all of them heavy .This one is surprised me and worked like a charm. I am very much happy . It’s not the heaviness that is important but the technique .
customer_reviews.author: Naresh

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled and I have a mobility scooter at work. I keep this doorstop in my basket. I ordered a size that would fit the doors I needed it for and it is working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish door stopper
customer_reviews.text: Bought the door stoppers in blue to use occasionally. They look very stylish in our modern interior and fit nicely under the small gap between the carpet and the door. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: this doorstop is amazing. It holds the door open and doesn't slide
customer_reviews.text: I just got this doorstop this week after trying dozens of others. I work in an inner city school where the doors are extremely heavy and old. Nothing else has worked in the past. So far, this doorstop is amazing. It holds the door open and doesn't slide. I'm interested to see how it holds up over the next months because that's when most door stops fall apart, but so far, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pachon

customer_reviews.title: Slim in the right area
customer_reviews.text: Our door that we need held open at my apartment complex is heavy and there's not much clearance at the bottom, so our previous door stop didn't wedge underneath well. This goes in perfectly though. Although instead of going in perpendicular with the door, it seems best to go along the length of the door, which is fine, but just surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Glass

customer_reviews.title: Door Won't Budge!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase! I bought this to hold open my very heavy steel classroom door. I've tried many door stops & none will hold the heavy door. This one works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Student Books

customer_reviews.title: Very short - my door swings right over it
customer_reviews.text: The doorstop seems to be of good quality, but it is very short. My door has a big door jam, and swings tight over top of the door stop. I may try to mount it on a wood block or something to make it taller, but it unfortunately doesn't work for me at the height it is. Make sure you check the height of the gap between the floor and your door before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy.  They're light.  No rubber base
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a rubber base. They don't hold that well with heavy doors that spring closed. They're lightweight and kind of flimsy. They're OK but I expected more for the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonk

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: This works better than the old brown rubber doorstops and looks very good on my blue veranda. It takes a strong wind to blow the door to. It's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph E. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Effective Doorstops
customer_reviews.text: I like how you use them on the end of the door instead of on the side. The height of your door doesn't matter because these will slide into place and keep the door open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 4 stars....
customer_reviews.text: Said it worked on all types of floors; needed something to keep one certain door in the house from catching the wind and flying shut. This thing still wants to slide on my tile floor. Will have to see if it can prevent further damage from forceful slamming. One star deduct for vendor begging for a review the day after I received it. Update 7/24/17: So far so good! No door slamming shut. Ingenious design. Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Buy USA!

customer_reviews.title: Very good door stopper!
customer_reviews.text: This door stopper is awesome! I had brought many different brands of door stoppers and this one is the best one that works very good!! Buy one and try it, you will be happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: margiemr

customer_reviews.title: Great little doorstop, effective and unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these and couldn't be happier with them. They work either parallel to the door or perpendicular to it, and slide easily on a hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: salmw

customer_reviews.title: Teacher approved
customer_reviews.text: My door literally scrapes the tile floor and nothing would fit underneath it. This fits and works great. Is easy to put in quickly even in heals. Teacher approved!!!!
customer_reviews.author: EMILY

customer_reviews.title: Not great for wood laminate floors but great for others.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our spare bedroom that has wood laminate flooring. If the dogs are playing in there and their toys go behind the door, they can lock themselves in. I was hoping this would not allow the door to move but it easily slides on the laminate floor. It needs some kind of a nonslip material on the back. I decided to take it to work for a heavy self closing door that often needs to be open. It works great there! That flooring is laminate squares that are used in high traffic area like hospitals and schools.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: These work better is sturdier than others we've tried. It barely works on the door that has a 3/4 inch gap to the floor. The description says you can use this with gaps up to an inch, but don't trust that. If you have a gap of 3/4 inch or more just start with the jumbo size.
customer_reviews.author: Anaeee

customer_reviews.title: Tried 7 different door stops and these are the only ones that worked.
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST doorstops we have ever used. We have 9 exterior doors on our house. All have very strong automatic door closers with varying amounts of space between the bottom of the door and the surface. I have tried 7 different kinds of door stops and none of them worked until I bought Jamm door stops. Jamm door stops are beautifully designed and are easily inserted beneath the end of the door and they hold all of our doors open on either smooth or rough surfaces. Great product and excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one for m and one for my daughter. She used the Jammies on her latestet business trip and was amazed at how much stronger the Jamm made for the closure on her hotel roon door; noticed also how much space there was between the door and floor to insert something before th Jamm was in place. She called me immeditaely to tell me how well the Jamm performed and we both had a peaceful night's sleep. I I can;t wait to use mine next week!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Mummert

customer_reviews.title: Works on tile
customer_reviews.text: I thought the 1 pack would come with more than 1 stopper. Seems a bit expensive for one single door stopper. But it's lightweight and it works to hold my door open on tile floor. Larger than I thought it'd be.
customer_reviews.author: Nina C.

customer_reviews.title: This is your item to keep your door propped open.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed and made product to keep my office door open. It works on my new short carpet and door does not slip during the day. There is very little room between the floor and the door, and this item still fits nicely in this small gap.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye Run

customer_reviews.title: Great little doorstop
customer_reviews.text: This is a weird thing to be excited about but this is a great doorstop. It’s got a low profile so you barely see it and it stays in place easily even when bumped. Glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Megan F

customer_reviews.title: Works great on condo decking, too!
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully on my condo's vinyl decking, the door does not budge. I was a bit concerned because the decking is a bit slick, works great tho. Wedge is very sturdy, I've had it a few weeks and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Works on carpet
customer_reviews.text: I’m using to keep door cracked so cat can go in and out without opening door completely. Works good on carpet . Also used to keep door from slamming shut when windy and worked well for that too. Have only tried on carpet so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dianmarie

customer_reviews.title: Like them so much we bought them for every door
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all: I bought one for a bathroom, and my dearly beloved thought so much of it that he bought a bunch for the rest of the house!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Karinch

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BOTHER
customer_reviews.text: Material is not soft enough to grab to stop a door. OK if you want to keep it from blowing closed but easy to push and move the door.
customer_reviews.author: steg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect door jam
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to keep our inside back door closed enough to let the cats go in and out. It does the job and can be adjusted with your foot, no bending down.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara in Buffalo

customer_reviews.title: The hidden door stopper
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom door was rehinged and now doesn’t stay open. I didn’t like the look of a regular door stopper sticking out. I placed the Jamm doorstopper behind the door up against the wall and it catches and releases the door easily and it’s no longer noticeable. Well made and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Brodowsky

customer_reviews.title: Scale
customer_reviews.text: They are quite a lot larger than the picture in your ad suggests. They work perfectly but just weren't what I anticipated relative to their size and therefore, their visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey F. Casida

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Received as expected and when placed into service, it performed just like I wanted it to. Nice to get a product that is well made and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It slides on the carpet, it squishes from the door, it doesn't stay in place or hold the door in place if the door is touched. I just wanted something that left a big enough gap for the cat and not big enough for the dog. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Ladylin

customer_reviews.title: Light but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold open the front door of our Florida condo while leaving the storm door closed and locked. The subtropical breeze would push the door around and even slam the door shut before I purchased this. Now I can position the door to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My door is actually too high off the floor for this (my fault) however, I just turned it the other way and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Completely and utterly useless for my door
customer_reviews.text: Completely and utterly useless for my door. Perhaps it will work with doors that hang lower to the ground. I'm going back to the old style door stops.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Manchester

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on laminate
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, it’s no good. It’s really cheaply made and doesn’t work at all on hardwood laminate. Bummer dude.
customer_reviews.author: TEAMN

customer_reviews.title: Good for more than just doors
customer_reviews.text: Works great on heavy door. Also 2 hold wheeled gaming chair in place when using under desk bike (Chair wheels don’t lock and it kept creeping backwards when using bike).
customer_reviews.author: stacey merrill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Two door stoppers keeps my 1 year old grandson from moving the front door either direction - - more opened or closed.
customer_reviews.author: MDMom

customer_reviews.title: I am really delighted with the two door Jams
customer_reviews.text: I am really delighted with the two door Jams. And the fact that I could buy the jams in a beautiful color (grey blue) was a wonderful extra. I use the jams to control the rocker motion of a heavy Mexican rocking chair and they control the rockers perfectly.I would most definitely buy them again. Thank you so much. My long search is finally over.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Diane Livingston

product_meta.title: Jamm Door Stopper | Door Stop Wedge Holds Doors Open in Both Directions | Premium Non Rubber Non Slip Hardware | Standard Size | Pacific Blue - 1 Pack
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pack| Color:Pacific Blue

THE DOOR STOP RE-INVENTED!

Traditional doorstops are a centuries-old design that are unreliable, unsafe and frustrating to use.They hold the door from one side only rendering them only 50% effective. 



Jamm doorstops holds doors in both directions making them 100% effective. 



Most effective door stop in the world!

- Are you tired of the multiple cheap doorstops you own that easily dislodge and become a trip hazard or a dog chew?
- Looking for a doorstop with functionality and a modern innovative design to use in your home, office our business? 
- Want a doorstop that allows you to regulate how far you want the door open or closed?  

Jamm doorstops offer you an effective and reliable solution!

 
- MULTI USE: It can help prevent finger injuries at home and at work; stops slamming doors and pets becoming trapped in rooms; and is perfect when painting or hanging a door.
- IDEAL SIZING: Your door Jamm is available in 2 sizes to fit most doorgaps. Size 1 REGULAR for doorgaps measuring 0.1 to 1 inch gap, and Size 2 JUMBO for gaps measuring 0.38 to 1.38 inch.Be sure to measure your door gap before purchasing.
- PREMIUM QUALITY MATERIALS: Made from food grade polymer.Free of Lead, BpA and Phthalates. UL Tested and the only door stop in the world to comply with the European General Product Safety Regulation 2005.
- MULTI AWARDS: Won multiple innovation awards in the Child Safety and Housewares Design sector.
- GREAT GIFT: An original & useful housewarming, hostess, Fathers Day and shower gift, not to forget great stocking stuffers at Christmas. 



BEST DOOR STOP EVER, or your money back!

100% Satisfaction Guarantee. Refund or Replacement. Ships from the USA.
feature_bullets: AWARD-WINNING DOORSTOP DESIGN : Jamm's unique door stopper design holds a door in both directions when inserted securely under the end of the door. Jamm holds the door from both sides so it does not dislodge easily making a safer way to hold doors open. Other doorstops hold the door from one side only and are easily dislodged becoming a trip hazard or obstacle.

PLEASE READ THIS SECTION CAREFULLY - THE IDEAL SIZE: This door stopper measures 5.1" L x 3.25" W x 1" H. They will fit under any of your doors hanging anywhere from 0.1 to 0.9 inch off the floor. For door gaps > 0.9", see our Jumbo Door Jamm!

DOES NOT OBSTRUCT WALKWAYS: The placement of this door stopper at the end of the door rather than the side makes for a clear walkway. This creates a safer space and makes it easier for wheeling or carting things through doorways.

A MUST HAVE for every home, office, business and toolbox! Great for trades and DIY projects such as painting or hanging a door; movers and decorators; hospitals and schools; hotels and museums - hardware for anywhere you need a door to remain securely open.
WORKS ON ALL FLOOR SURFACES: Our anti-slip base and material provides superior gripping power and allows your door stoppers to work on all surfaces. Easy to use. Wedges like no other door stops.
